message: 서버 오류가 발생했습니다: executeMany; bad SQL grammar [SELECT creations.id, creations.user_id, creations.creation_type, creations.style_id, creations.title, creations.description, creations.prompt, creations.status, creations.progress, creations.credit_cost, creations.price, creations.is_for_sale, creations.like_count, creations.metadata, creations.processing_started_at, creations.processing_completed_at, creations.created_at, creations.updated_at, creations.completed_at, creations.error_message, creations.input_data FROM creations WHERE creations.status = ?]
